The People of the State of Illinois, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Willie Buford, Defendant-Appellant.(No. 53666;First DistrictMay 10, 1971.Modified on denial of rehearing June 3, 1971.Gerald W. Getty, Public Defender, of Chicago, (Mary Cahill, Assistant Public Defender, of counsel,) for appellant.Edward V. Hanrahan, State’s Attorney, of Chicago, (Robert A. Novelle, Assistant State’s Attorney, of counsel,) for the People.

Abstract of Decision

Opinion by Mr. JUSTICE GOLDBERG.
